backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, and CRUD operations for resumes with role promotion for authenticated users.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and tests with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list of summarized descriptions for major frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode themes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts and mounting the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring routes, theme provider, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright and a privacy policy link.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, sync indicator, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout handling online sync retries, global toasts, and rendering header, footer, and nested routes.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication UI for login/logout with Internet Identity and profile display logic.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Displays a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name. Handles input state, save action, and visibility logic.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumeFor: Lets users choose resume templates, fonts, and color themes, updating formatting settings through callbacks. Renders selectable thumbnail previews and dropdowns.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumePre: Renders a scaled, scrollable preview of the resume using the template renderer inside a card. Keeps the preview sticky for easy reference while editing.
frontend/src/components/resume/ResumePri: Provides a printâ€‘only view of the resume by rendering the template at full size for printing. Intended for print media output.
frontend/src/components/resume/sections/: Allows adding, editing, and removing achievements with fields for title, date, and description. Updates the achievements list through change handlers.
Manages a list of certifications with editable fields such as name, issuer, dates, and credential ID. Supports adding and deleting certification entries.
React component that manages a list of education entries with add, remove, and field editing functionality.
React UI for adding, removing, and editing work experience items in a resume.
Component for managing a list of hobbies, allowing users to add, remove, and edit hobby names.
Editor for language entries, supporting name and proficiency updates with add/remove controls.
Component for creating and editing project entries including name, description, technologies, link, and dates.
Resume skill editor allowing users to manage skill names and proficiency levels with add/remove actions.
frontend/src/components/resume/templates: Renders a resume using provided content and formatting, with sections for personal info, summary, experience, education, and skills.
frontend/src/components/ResumeEditorForm: Provides a multi-section form for editing resume metadata, personal info, summary, and content sections. Propagates changes via callbacks to update the parent resume state.
Shows online/offline status and sync information for authenticated users, including last sync time and pending changes. Listens to sync queue updates and displays a tooltip with details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile from the backend once an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and initializes stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks and returns the browser's online/offline status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutations and queries for backend resume and user-profile operations using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResumes.ts: Combines local and backend resumes, handles CRUD operations, and manages offline/online sync behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, resume font/color classes, and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Renders the Privacy Policy page with sections describing data storage, permissions, and usage policies.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeEditor.tsx: Provides the resume editor UI with loading, error handling, editing, saving, and PDF export features.
frontend/src/pages/ResumesDashboard.tsx: Displays the list of resumes and supports creating, renaming, duplicating, deleting, and navigating to resumes.
frontend/src/storage/resumeLocalStore.ts: Handles local resume CRUD operations using localStorage with an in-memory fallback and versioning support.
frontend/src/storage/resumeSyncQueue.ts: Manages a local sync queue for resume operations, including adding, removing, and tracking sync events.
frontend/src/types/resume.ts: Defines TypeScript types and default values for resume content, formatting, and related sections.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Provides functions to extract user-friendly error messages and detect storage-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates unique IDs using timestamps and random strings.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Validates resume data, sets a safe filename, triggers browser print for PDF export, and restores the document title.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state, versions, and implemented features for an ICP resume builder app.
